item.title: Datenschutz
item.description: Im Folgenden möchten wir Sie aufklären, wie Ihre Daten von uns verarbeitet werden. Verantwortlich im Sinne der DSGVO ist: Sandra Schönberger Ludwigstr. 27 95213 Münchberg Sollten Sie per E-Mail mit uns Kontakt aufnehmen, werden die mitgeteilten Daten von uns gespeichert, um Ihr Anliegen zu bearbeiten. Wir werden die Daten löschen, sobald die Speicherung nicht mehr erforderlich ist oder die Verarbeitung einschränken, falls gesetzliche Aufbewahrungspflichten bestehen. Betroffenenrechte Sie haben als betroffene Person, das Recht auf Auskunft, das Recht auf Berichtigung oder Löschung, das Recht auf Einschränkung der Verarbeitung und das Recht auf Widerspruch gegen die Verarbeitung Ihrer Daten.

item.title: Impressum
item.description: Angaben gemäß § 5 TMG Sandra Schönberger Ludwigstr. 27 95213 Münchberg Kontakt Telefon: +49 15732638571 E-Mail: hello@sandraschoenberger.de Quelle: Recht24

item.title: Open Source Lizenzen
item.description: Diese Website setzt folgende Komponenten ein, die unter Open-Source-Lizenzen stehen. This Website makes use of the following components which are distributed under Open Source Licenses. Manrope Font Copyright 2018 The Manrope Project Authors (https://github.com/sharanda/manrope) This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is copied below, and is also available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL ----------------------------------------------------------- SIL OPEN FONT LICENSE Version 1.1 - 26 February 2007 ----------------------------------------------------------- PREAMBLE The goals of the Open Font License (OFL) are to stimulate worldwide development of collaborative font projects, to support the font creation efforts of academic and linguistic communities, and to provide a free and open framework in which fonts may be shared and improved in partnership with others.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello again, my name is Sandra and I’m in the 4th semester of studying communication design at Hof University. I’m 19 years old and originally from a small town near Landshut. In 2020 I finished my A levels and started to study right away. I’ve always loved to be creative and to help people out, therefore communication design was my first choice. And I’m still very happy with my decision. My main emphasis can be found in the sectors of editorial-design, graphic design, social design and photography.

item.title: Mauergestaltung
item.description: Designing and painting of a mural for our campus.

item.title: Contact
item.description: If you are interested in working with me, you can send me an e-mail or message me via Instagram or LinkedIn. I would be very happy to hear from you and get to know you! Mail: hello@sandraschoenberger.de LinkedIn Instagram

item.title: Skillset
item.description: The Adobe Creative Cloud forms a constant part of my projects. Therefore I have mastered the basic skills in every program. However, I am most familiar with InDesign, Lightroom Classic, PremierePro and Photoshop. Over the last two years I was also able to get to know a lot of different printing media such as silkscreen printing, riso printing or linocut. Since last semester I am very familiar with developing UX-Prototypes in Figma or Adobe XD.
